title: Live-Tweet a Sporting Event
description: A sports reporter is covering a championship game and needs to provide real-time updates and commentary on Twitter.

tasks.description: During the game, post immediate updates of key plays, scores, and incidents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The Twitter feed provides a real-time account of the game.

tasks.description: Intersperse the play-by-play updates with insightful commentary, statistics, and analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: The feed offers more than just scores, adding value for the audience.

tasks.description: Engage with followers by replying to their questions and retweeting interesting observations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter builds a community around their live coverage.
